metadata.title: eDoktor
metadata.description: The national digital health platform of Albania

description: Book appointments, manage prescriptions, and access your public health data

title: Albania’s complete national
digital health platform
header.description: A single, unified digital gateway where citizens, doctors, institutions, and emergency services connect seamlessly. Built with advanced technology, strong security, and a human-centered approach.
header.info: Technology that strengthens institutions. Digitalization that empowers citizens. Read more on

points.title: Trust and credibility
points.description: Developed using international health IT standards, secure cloud architecture, data encryption, and best practices in digital health transformation.

points.title: Modern healthcare experience
points.description: A platform designed to simplify citizens’ lives, improve medical workflows, and empower Albania’s health institutions with real-time data and digital tools.

points.title: Connected with Digital Health Record
points.description: With eDoctor, citizens gain immediate access to their complete Digital Health Record, offering a fully integrated overview of their health history.

title: A modern digital health
ecosystem for the entire country
healthcare.description: eDoctor is Albania’s most advanced and comprehensive digital health platform, designed to unify all major healthcare services into one secure, efficient, and user-friendly system. It empowers citizens, supports doctors, and strengthens public institutions through technology.

title: A unified suite of
digital health services
header.description: eDoktor brings together all essential healthcare services into one seamless, secure and user-friendly platform. Each service is designed to simplify the patient journey, support medical professionals
header.description-full: eDoktor brings together all essential healthcare services into one seamless, secure and user-friendly platform. Each service is designed to simplify the patient journey, support medical professionals. The mobile app offers institutions the data they need to deliver efficient and high-quality care.

title: Digital marketplace
of pharmacies
booking.description: Order medicines online and get fast home delivery. Track your orders and receive real-time updates inside the app.
